The photographs were found to be 3: D artist renderings and not authentic color photographs of the Russian Kalinin K-7 heavy bomber.
The purpose of Levin: s work was clarified as a techno-fantasy and techno-utopia, with no serious applications or intentions for the aircraft to actually fly.
The main focus of Levin: s work was to ensure technical reliability by adhering to the style and appearance of aircraft parts from the 1930s.
